title: When to say Sami Allah huliman hamida and Rabbana lakal hamd? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from the US I 
have a question regarding   tamsi' and tahamid during prayer when to say so al tasmi' is saying [ __ ] when 
rising from and al tahmid is saying when to say it tasmi' is to be said while rising 
from rukuu so I'm in the rukuu when I Rise I say   [ __ ] I do not do like some imams do they 
fully rise until they're erect and then they   say [ __ ] so that their microphone would 
be adjacent to their mouth this is wrong   because this has to be done when 
moving not when reaching the position   and of course [ __ ] can only be said when you're 
erect because there isn't except one maybe one   and a half second between rising up from the 
record and standing position as for the follower   this is problematic because once they are 
in the rukuu position and the Imam says a lot of the Muslims the moment they 
say they hear [ __ ] they rise up   which is wrong the follower must not move 
until the Imam is or has reached the position   he is going to so if he's standing after rukuu 
and he's falling to sujud he says [ __ ] you   should not bend your back until his forehead 
touches the ground only then you can move   regardless whether he said Allahu Akbar early or 
late this is the Sunnah this is what the sahaba   used to do they would not bend their back 
until the forehead of the Prophet (Peace and   Blessings Upon him) reached the ground now 
in big Masjid you have no choice of knowing   whether the Imam has reached the ground or not 
or whether the Imam has stood direct or not so   once he finishes this is when you move and you say 
while moving and I hope this answers your question and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford it 
that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled   for one free session and this is for everybody 
if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot   afford it because they're poor I'll give them 
one free session without a problem a full half   an hour so come to me and let's speak about 
it inshallah within the following two days   or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for All
